# Costanza

Review codebase and propose areas of improvement for the tool.

Our focus should be on lowering latency for near instant feedback in the chat loop, and enabling the user to set preferences locally (models to interact with, etc other features).

Each proposal will be in .md format, written to a /docs directory as new Feature Requests.
